core.meeting

Class Meeting

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.meeting.Meeting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Meeting
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent a meeting between two users using this system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      Meeting(java.lang.String location, java.time.LocalDateTime meetingTime, int meetingId)
      Creates a meeting with its location, meetingTime, and unique meetingId as its identifier.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Meeting

        public Meeting(java.lang.String location,
               java.time.LocalDateTime meetingTime,
               int meetingId)
        Creates a meeting with its location, meetingTime, and unique meetingId as its identifier. Initially, timesEdited, representing the number of time meeting is edited, is 0. meetingConfirmed and meetingOccurred is false for both users that involved in this trade.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the meeting.
        meetingTime - the time of the meeting.
        meetingId - an int which is an unique identifier of this meeting.

    • Method Detail

      • getMeetingId

        public java.lang.Integer getMeetingId()
        Gets the meetingId, which is the unique identifier of this meeting.
        Returns:
        meetingId of this meeting.

      • setTimesEdited

        public void setTimesEdited(int userOrder,
                           int newTimesEdited)
        Sets timesEdited, the number of time an user has edited this meeting, with newTimesEdited and given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing this action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        newTimesEdited - an int representing the new number of time user edited in this meeting.

      • getTimesEdited

        public int getTimesEdited(int userOrder)
        Gets timesEdited of a user, given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing the action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        Returns:
        an int which is the corresponding number of time meeting is edited by this user, from TimesEdited.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(java.lang.String newLocation)
        Sets the location of this meeting, with newLocation.
        Parameters:
        newLocation - new location of this meeting.

      • getLocation

        public java.lang.String getLocation()
        Gets the location of this meeting.
        Returns:
        location of this meeting.

      • setMeetingTime

        public void setMeetingTime(java.time.LocalDateTime meetingTime)
        Sets the time of this meeting.
        Parameters:
        meetingTime - new meetingTime of this meeting.

      • getMeetingTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getMeetingTime()
        Getter for the time of this meeting.
        Returns:
        time of this meeting.

      • setMeetingConfirmed

        public void setMeetingConfirmed(int userOrder,
                                boolean confirmed)
        Sets confirmation of time and location from a user involved in this meeting with confirmed, given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing this action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        confirmed - a boolean that can be either true or false. If it is true, it means the user has confirmed that the time and place, and vice versa.

      • getMeetingConfirmed

        public boolean getMeetingConfirmed(int userOrder)
        Gets confirmation of time and location from a user involved in this meeting, given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing this action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        Returns:
        a boolean value, true if and only if the meeting is successfully confirmed by given user involved.

      • setMeetingOccurred

        public void setMeetingOccurred(int userOrder,
                               boolean occurred)
        Sets confirmation for whether this meeting has occurred from a user involved in the meeting with occurred, given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing this action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        occurred - a boolean that can be either true or false. If it is true, it means the user claim the meeting has occurred, and vice versa.

      • getMeetingOccurred

        public boolean getMeetingOccurred(int userOrder)
        Gets confirmation for whether the meeting has occurred from a user involved in this meeting, given userOrder.

        Precondition: userOrder must be 0 or 1.

        Parameters:
        userOrder - an int representing the user that is performing this action. 0 is the initiator of the trade, 1 is the responder of the trade.
        Returns:
        boolean value, true if and only if the meeting is successfully confirmed occurred by given user involved.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Gives a string representation of this meeting.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        information about the meeting as a string, including location, time, arrangement status, occurrence confirmation status.
